content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the negotiation of the rental price for an apartment in Duisburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: No, we did not agree on a final price. We were not able to come to an agreement that satisfied both parties.
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content:
[[[
  ['The final price we agreed upon was 500 Euro.'],
  ['We did not agree on a final price.']
][[role!= 'user']]]
name: Haoyu Wang
